game.name: COLLAPSE COMPANY
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: “COLLAPSE COMPANY” is a round-based roguelike action FPS for 1–4 players exploring shifting underground dungeons. Your goal is to activate the deep Particle Acceleration Reactor and escape before time runs out. Gather resources, upgrade gear, and push into riskier zones.
game.shortDescriptionEn: “COLLAPSE COMPANY” is a round-based roguelike action FPS for 1–4 players exploring shifting underground dungeons. Your goal is to activate the deep Particle Acceleration Reactor and escape before time runs out. Gather resources, upgrade gear, and push into riskier zones.
